findings.rationale: The absence of audit rights may hinder the ability to monitor compliance with confidentiality obligations, increasing the risk of unauthorized disclosures.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The absence of intellectual property provisions may lead to disputes regarding ownership and usage rights of any inventions or ideas developed during the agreement.
The indemnification clause only provides coverage as required by law, which may not fully protect the Disclosing Party from all potential claims.
findings.evidence_quote: The Receiving Party shall indemnify the Disclosing Party to the extent required by law for all claims.
